content: sts turn set-up ws p1 k1 p1 pm kfbf pm p1 k1 p1 pm weave in ends to ws wet block and dry flat kfbf pm p1 k1 p1 15 sts shawl body row 1 rs k3 sm m1l knit to next marker m1r sm k3 sm m1l knit to next marker m1r sm k3 4 sts increased row 2 ws p1 k1 p1 sm k1 p1 to 1 st before next m k1 sm p1 k1 p1 sm k1 p1 to 1 st before next m k1 sm p1 k1 p1 row 3 rs repeat row 1 row 4 ws p1 k1 p1 sm p1 k1 to 1 st before next m p1 sm p1 k1 p1 sm p1 k1 to 1 st before next m p1 sm p1 k1 p1 repeat row 1-4 until you have 279 sts on the needle 135 sts on each side between markers on either side of spine sts or until desired size ending with a row 4 and with the understanding that this may change yardage require- ments shawl border eyelet row rs k3 sm m1l k1 yo k2tog to m m1r sm k3 sm m1l ssk yo to 1 st before m k1 m1r sm k3 repeat shawl body row 1-4 as established beginning with a ws row 2 until you have 319 sts on the needle 155 sts between markers on either side of spine sts repeat row 1-2 once more 323 sts total 2 visit follow share visit us follow us share with us 740 winslow way east #thelambandkid bainbridge island wa @thelambandkid and www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid #tlkthecozyshawl the lamb & kid the cozy shawl version 1 // ©2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
